author: krysto2002
title: Cheap, decent, good for parts
review:
First off, I did not get this through Japan, although not listed, the set was also a promo release for Florida Natural OJ, and came free at the supermarkets.

The set itself is alright, better than the other blocky set available. This set has a few hinges, good for builders, and four of the "tooth plates" in tan, so the set isn't bad, especially since it was free. How you will find it now is beyond me!
